column1: #COVID19 has shown how much #CA34 can do when we work together.  Groups like @LTSC @KeiroConnect and LTCC have worked tirelessly to safely deliver 9000+ meals to #Angelenos and help our local #SmallBusinesses. I’m honored I could help along the way!   https://t.co/WzkxpISytg

Karen Quintana — of #EagleRock — comes from the Sac and Fox Nation of Oklahoma.  She’s served #CA34 by registering voters helping Native residents #BeCounted in the #Census and securing housing and healthcare for those experiencing homelessness.  #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth https://t.co/aVBxRL03VQ
Happy #Thanksgiving!  To those in #LosAngeles and across the U.S. please stay safe and #StayHome as we celebrate all we’re thankful for. https://t.co/TO1NaDwGnV

Next in our #CA34 #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth profiles is Omar Montana!  Omar — from the Tohono O’odham Nation of Arizona — works with @UAIIinc on health and safety issues in our community and has helped build a relationship between his tribe and members living in #LosAngeles! https://t.co/w8kg5P1mZq

I’m outraged but unsurprised. This is exactly what I feared when I visited Irwin Co: Retaliation against these women for speaking out about their medical abuse.  We’re demanding @DHSgov release these women stay their deportation & guarantee their access to fed. investigators. https://t.co/FhhVB5TG0y https://t.co/j96aFyMirO

It’s time for another #CaseworkSpotlight!  My team worked with @IRSnews and @YourVoiceAtIRS to help Pico Union Hope receive a decision about their nonprofit status so they can continue their hard work distributing food to 6000+ #Angelenos each month!  For help: ☎️ 213.481.1425 https://t.co/1Ry43jEyu1

El Día de Acción de Gracias como el año 2020 va a ser muy diferente.  A medida que #COVID19 siga aumentando en #LosAngeles por favor quédese en casa y reúnase solamente con los miembros de su hogar.  Usen opciones gratuitas como Zoom o FaceTime para celebrar #Thanksgiving! https://t.co/V34DFwJVnH

I’m grateful for the chance to help out organizations like the #LA Boys & Girls Club which never take a break from helping out #WorkingFamilies!  Tonight I stopped by to help distribute food to #Angelenos in #LincolnHeights and saw how strong #CA34 is when we work together! 🦃 https://t.co/6oEf6eT5KC

Now’s the time to ensure you #GetCovered for 2021!  Millions of #Californians have benefited from the #ACA and received affordable health insurance for the first time.  Update your coverage or enroll in a plan today at https://t.co/pQkfqEvrbF! https://t.co/xGI7uX3WbI

Why just one more?   We have to pass the #EmergencyMoneyForThePeople Act because #WorkingFamilies need more than $1200.  They need monthly $2000 checks to get through this crisis. https://t.co/Hr5f0IuGXh

#TeamGomez out in the community!   Today my Field Deputy Joan helped distribute nutritious food ahead of #Thanksgiving at the Anderson Munger Family YMCA in #Koreatown. 🦃🥦🍓  Nearly 800 families came by for fresh produce thanks to the YMCA and the Wilshire Rotary Club of LA! https://t.co/REBwJJnj26

Like much of 2020 #Thanksgiving will look different this year.  As #COVID19 surges in our #LA community please stay home and gather with those in your household only.  With free options on 🦃 Day like Zoom Skype Google Meet or FaceTime how will you celebrate virtually? https://t.co/UQuyCQ0iHA
독감 예방주사를 꼭 맞으세요!  그러면 우리가 함께 #코로나19 를 잘 이겨낼 수 있습니다.   우리 #CA34 지역을 더 건강하게 하기위해 https://t.co/31ApinLhCG에 가셔서 무료 예방 주사를 어디서 받을 수 있는지 알아보세요. https://t.co/Mm6QkxFMzC

Good.  This ridiculous obstruction should’ve never happened but now let’s focus on the #PublicHealth crisis we need to tackle and the millions of #WorkingFamilies who need help. https://t.co/qbevcfnsQs

Now we’re at #BoyleHeights City Hall with @kdeleon @SenMariaEDurazo and @SantiagoAD53 helping distribute #Thanksgiving turkeys!  Community members can stop by until 7:00pm to grab a turkey. 🦃 Just make sure you #WearAMask practice social distancing and wash your hands. https://t.co/bQ5Wew2NO7

I’m out in #ElSereno with my friend Councilman @kdeleon helping distribute turkeys turkeys and more turkeys!  If you are nearby and in need of a #Thanksgiving turkey stop by! 🦃 Staff and volunteers will be here until 6:00pm helping #Angelenos in need. https://t.co/V6zk6BolMQ

Omerlene comes from the Gila River Indian Community in Arizona.  For 36 years she’s served #LosAngeles with @UAIIinc helping our neighbors access emergency housing resources and healthy food.   She’s also been honored by @LACountyBOS and @LACityCouncil for her work!  (2/2)

To celebrate #NativeAmericanHeritageMonth — and to highlight important voices in our community — we’re profiling Native leaders in #CA34.  First up is Omerlene Thompson — of #HighlandPark — from the Akimel O’odham tribe.  (1/2) https://t.co/WNPeXsw4Zn

Year round including the holiday season organizations like @BreseeLA lend a helping hand to #CA34 families.  Today my Field Deputy Rolando joined them in #Koreatown to help distribute turkey and other nutritious foods in time for #Thanksgiving. 🦃 https://t.co/oVKd3f9NeR

Pandemic Unemployment Assistance has been especially helpful to contractors and freelancers in our #CA34 community.  As we take the precautions necessary to tackle #COVID19 we need to send #WorkingFamilies more relief.  @SenateGOP must pass the #HeroesAct immediately! https://t.co/8gPvGhR9ZH

Capitol Hill staff are the unsung heroes of Congress — especially during this #PublicHealth crisis.  Thank you to these workers food service staff janitors and more for all their work behind the scenes to keep the Capitol running and keep us safe! https://t.co/HnDggiK78s

More transgender non-binary & gender non-conforming people were tragically killed in 2020 than any year in U.S. history.  On #TransDayOfRemembrance & every day we celebrate their memories & honor them by fighting to end this epidemic of injustice.  https://t.co/yyUprDSBr2

🚨#CA34🚨  Tomorrow is your LAST day to claim your #CARESAct stimulus check if you haven’t already.  If you don’t typically file taxes check your eligibility and submit your info here: https://t.co/2XlMKMxc55 https://t.co/1pDN2ENKwp

The #ClimateCrisis is the biggest existential threat to our nation.  Combatting it with bold #ClimateAction starts with having accurate high-quality info.  My colleagues and I won’t let @realDonaldTrump suppress and manipulate climate science and undermine #NCA5. Read ⬇️ https://t.co/pePtg1yzc5
Happy birthday to President-Elect Joe Biden!  America is ready for your vision guidance and leadership. Let’s get to work! 💪🏽 https://t.co/rpk0ZPZW5O

Joe Biden is President-elect — regardless of what ridiculous conspiracy @realDonaldTrump tweets out today.  @GSAEmily needs to certify the transition immediately. Our national security and #PublicHealth is at risk. https://t.co/OqPLSSn9Rl

🚨 Tomorrow 🚨  Stop by @paralosninosorg at 474 Hartford Ave. for free #PPE from 12:00pm to 3:00pm!  As #COVID19 surges the easiest way to keep our families and #CA34 healthy is to #WearAMask! https://t.co/SSqwfbrSdC

1 in 10 Americans lives with diabetes as a pre-existing condition and many struggle to access affordable insulin.  As so many have lost health insurance due to #COVID19 we must fight for #MedicareForAll and guaranteed access to insulin.  #DiabetesAwarenessMonth https://t.co/xmFOrNgNlQ

Congratulations to my colleague @RepKClark!  It’s been an honor to work alongside her the past few years and I’m confident she’ll continue her excellent service to Massachusetts’ 5th District and our country. https://t.co/mBIPErFurk

Congratulations to my friend @RepPeteAguilar!  Since coming to Congress he’s worked hard to serve his constituents and Californians alike. I look forward to working alongside him as @HouseDemocrats’ Vice Chair. https://t.co/kDtlpKw3Fk

.@realDonaldTrump’s objection to a smooth transition isn’t just political games it could be deadly.  #COVID19 is surging across the U.S. and decisions like this will only cost more lives. https://t.co/l4GHH0vofn

These absurd comments are incompetent and dangerous.  While the Trump administration continues to ignore #COVID19 we need to keep our communities safe as cases surge.  #WearAMask #StayHome if you’re able and #StayStrongLA. https://t.co/oP7wuxLIXa

🚨#Angelenos🚨  A critical part of staying healthy as #COVID19 surges is getting your flu shot!  Swing by @CalStateLA this Friday from 10am to 2pm to get yours and help keep #CA34 safe. https://t.co/8uZqEDqVZk

It’s impossible to tell the story of our nation without the story of Latinos.  The House passed a bipartisan bill to create a #LatinoMuseum in D.C. Now we need the Senate to vote #YesOnS1267 and ensure @smithsonian commemorates our rich history and heritage. https://t.co/dlyX4Yq9fs

If this isn’t enough to convince my @SenateGOP colleagues what is?  How many more #WorkingFamilies need to go hungry each night for you to act?  @HouseDemocrats’ #HeroesAct has $600/wk unemployment benefits another $1200 check SNAP expansion & more. Do your job @senatemajldr! https://t.co/Kgj9hSMPBB

Yesterday was our worst #COVID19 day on record in #California. We worked to help flatten the curve once and we can do it again.  To keep our #CA34 community safe and healthy:  🔸 #WearAMask  🔸 #StayHome if you’re able 🔸 Get tested       ➡️ https://t.co/PKbxj6AyDD https://t.co/nDCWrapVop https://t.co/AgcAGOSHYE

It’s #TransAwarenessWeek!  No matter the day or week it’s up to us to listen learn and act to make ALL communities safe inclusive and supportive for our transgender neighbors.  My @LGBTEqCaucus colleagues and I are fighting every day for #EqualityForAll!  #TransLivesMatter https://t.co/DYK7V9Al4o https://t.co/wJbI5ZWQOL

This admin wants to prohibit ALL global health orgs. that receive U.S. aid from offering abortion info or services.  My colleagues & I demand @StateDept & @HHSGov withdraw this rule immediately. https://t.co/knivL7ccMQ

This artwork in #BoyleHeights is a touching but stark reminder of all the lives our community has lost due to #COVID19.  As we honor the memories of these #Angelenos do your part to keep #CA34 safe: #WearAMask & #StayHome if you’re able. We can tackle this crisis.  #MuralMonday https://t.co/JkC0At4P6t
Back in Washington this week and presiding over the House floor!   Doing the people’s business means wearing a mask! 😷 https://t.co/bRkmx4f8VL

This is a critical decision for the thousands of #DACA recipients who uplift each of our communities.  Not only will @HouseDemocrats work swiftly with the Biden admin to make #DACA permanent we’ll fight to enact the #DreamAndPromise Act and ensure a pathway to citizenship. https://t.co/eCc4mR4BDo

Since my days in the Assembly my office worked alongside the El Rio Veterans Collaborative to bring a new memorial to #NELA.   Today they got to unveil the new memorial. Congratulations to the El Rio de Los Angeles Veterans Collaborative!   This is a symbol of pride for #CA34. https://t.co/sh40DbxkvN

The #FestivalofLights is a joyous time to reflect and celebrate the triumph of light over darkness good over evil.  I wish all those celebrating in #CA34 and around the world a happy and safe #Diwali!  https://t.co/5kCIVIeBug https://t.co/ujXchEV5xk

Damn right I’m furious. I have no patience for harmful rhetoric — especially from a #SCOTUS Justice.  I go to work each day and proudly fight for #EqualityForAll. And trust me the racist insults in the comment section of my social media won’t deter me.   https://t.co/o5IdGzINJP
#WearAMask and please get your flu shot.  Two easy steps to keep our #CA34 community safe and healthy as #COVID19 continues to surge. https://t.co/21I06T0QtC

This is a historic moment for @MLB and sports across the country.  Given Kim's years of experience in baseball including with my hometown @Dodgers this day is long overdue.  Congratulations Kim! https://t.co/k1RWy7JAtz

Last month @HouseDemocrats passed $120 billion for restaurant relief.  Our favorite local eats help make #LA unique and our service workers help keep our city running.  More @SenateGOP inaction will cost millions more jobs. Pass the #HeroesAct @senatemajldr! https://t.co/JNU2g5dH23

Today my Field Deputy Joan stopped by the Anderson Munger YMCA in #Koreatown to help #Angelenos in need!  Since September the Anderson Munger YMCA has helped feed 200+ #WorkingFamilies each week with nutritious meals fresh fruits and veggies and even pet food! 🍊🥦🐶 https://t.co/KvXVaLuNAY

Homophobic rhetoric isn’t a matter of free speech. It’s a matter of hate speech.  These are stunning harmful words from Justice Alito.  That’s why my @LGBTEqCaucus colleagues and I introduced a resolution reaffirming marriage equality and #SCOTUS’ Obergefell v. Hodges decision. https://t.co/CKbBJ2TcO9

Stories like Steven’s — @StevenVsPharma — can be heard across the U.S.  The #AffordableCareAct has saved countless lives and uplifted many more #WorkingFamilies.  There’s no excuse for Republicans to dismantle it — during a pandemic or not.  https://t.co/mQ1Q8R12Tc

My Senior Field Deputy Roberto joined Izamara Gamaliel and @LAsBEST at the Wilson High School food distribution in #ElSereno today!  Thank you to all the volunteers and @WHS_LAUSD for looking out for #WorkingFamilies during this difficult time.  #StayStrongLA https://t.co/GFF1mQT9Ay

For half a year @SenateGOP has turned their backs on #WorkingFamilies.  @HouseDemocrats’ bill prioritizes #RentRelief $600/wk unemployment insurance up to $6K/ family in stimulus payments and more.  This is a humanitarian crisis @senatemajldr. Pass the #HeroesAct! https://t.co/CQvq4eJxHS

In honor of #VeteransDay2020 my staff joined Tony Zapata 1st Sergeant Angel Velez and @ItsJulieSands at the Mexican American All Wars Memorial in #BoyleHeights.   Words will never capture what you and your families’ sacrifices mean to us.   #ThankyouforyourService https://t.co/wYhQd5ZXVd

Alfred Chung served from 1970 to 1971 in the Republic of Korea Army Tiger Infantry Division in the Vietnam War at the An Khê Pass.  Like Alfred so many Korean Vietnam War Veterans in #CA34 and across U.S. deserve recognition for fighting alongside our nation.  #CA34VeteransDay https://t.co/8VLpoQm3Wu

Staff Sergeant Stephanie Maynetto-Jackson — from #HighlandPark — served in the @USArmy from 2008 to 2018 in Iraq and Afghanistan.  She served alongside her husband SSG Stuart D. Jackson until his death in December 2017.  Thank you both for your service.  #CA34VeteransDay https://t.co/2zuR6HGGON

On this #VeteransDay — and every day — we thank & honor all those who have served our nation.  We are grateful to those who’ve fought for our values of equality & justice even when our nation hasn’t always lived up to them at home.  Today we’re sharing some of our #CA34 heroes. https://t.co/27fMZidBpo

It couldn’t be more clear that Nielsen LIED to Congress.   Today I’m demanding the @FBI open a perjury investigation into the former @DHSgov Secretary. (4/4)

That same month @RepJerryNadler questioned then @DHSgov Secretary Nielsen - UNDER OATH - if she was doing anything to DECREASE processing capacity at ports.   She said “No.”  Today’s @DHSOIG report reveals that Nielsen manufactured capacity issues at the border. (3/4) https://t.co/A6GaBN1rpp https://t.co/oWkNRqYzft

Under U.S. law people arriving at the border have a RIGHT to request asylum w/o being criminalized turned back or separated from their kids.
